definition: The act of transitioning from being awake to being in a state of rest, typically referring to the action of preparing oneself to sleep by getting into bed.

examples.english: I go to bed at 10 PM.

examples.german: Das Zubettgehen ist wichtig f√ºr einen guten Schlaf.
examples.english: Going to bed is important for a good sleep.

examples.german: Meine Mutter erinnert mich immer ans Zubettgehen.
examples.english: My mother always reminds me to go to bed.

examples.german: Ich lese gerne vor dem Zubettgehen.
examples.english: I like to read before going to bed.

examples.german: Das Zubettgehen ist Teil meiner Abendroutine.
examples.english: Going to bed is part of my evening routine.
